title: Do the weirdest thing that feels right
dot:
digraph WeirdestThing{graph[splines=true, nodesep=0.6, ranksep=0.8];node[shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor="#E6F2FF", fontsize=10];edge[color="#6699FF", arrowhead=normal];subgraph cluster_context{label="Context & Background";style=dashed;WritingWins[label="Reverse engineering writing wins"];SubstackFeature[label="Substack feature
'A Pilgrimage for Book People'"];WritingDecisions[label="Decision impact on writing & life"];}subgraph cluster_mantra{label="Core Mantra";style=dashed;Mantra[label=""Do the weirdest thing
that feels right."", shape=box, fillcolor="#CCFFCC"];}subgraph cluster_essays{label="Essays & Topics";style=dashed;EssaysWorked[label="Essays that 'worked'"];PersonalEssay[label="Personal Essay"];QuickEssay[label="Quick Essay"];VariedTopics[label="Varied Topics"];}subgraph cluster_life_decisions{label="Life Decisions";style=dashed;WeirdChoices[label="Weird choices
led to success"];RegularChoices[label="Regular choices
led to regrets"];}WritingWins->Mantra;SubstackFeature->WritingDecisions;WritingDecisions->Mantra;Mantra->EssaysWorked[label="Guides"];Mantra->WeirdChoices[label="Guides"];Mantra->RegularChoices[label="Avoids"];EssaysWorked->PersonalEssay;EssaysWorked->QuickEssay;EssaysWorked->VariedTopics;WeirdChoices->RegularChoices[color=transparent];node[shape=plaintext, fontsize=9, fontcolor="#666666"];Explanation[label="The mantra 'Do the weirdest thing that feels right'
